Talk09:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Admiration_01>Now I can make good on all my big talk!<sp:0:4:0>You know, this isn't the only cave in these
mountains with pools of freezing water.
Be careful where you explore.
Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wait... <sp:5:0:0>You didn't actually cross the pond
and pick the chillshrooms, did you?!<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>You weren't worried about falling into
the freezing water?<sp:0:4:0>Well, gosh. That's really brave of you.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I can't just take them for free though.
Here, why don't I give you this?
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>What a disaster. I came all this way to
scrounge mushrooms, and now this.<sp:0:4:0>I'll never get to the deep parts of the
cave with a messed-up wing.
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sigh_00>I'm getting nowhere with this. <sp:5:1:0>I guess
I should go back for now and give the
others the bad news.
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkPositive><clr:0000>Chillshrooms<clr:ffff> grow all over this cave,
so I figured it'd be a prime spot for
scavenging a little food.<sp:0:4:0>But <clr:0000>cold water<clr:ffff> has built up in here now,
and I can't pick any chillshrooms without
crossing it.
Talk12: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Now, how am I going to cross that pond?
Talk08_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh>There are still some caves where the cold
water lingers. Guess we're not totally free
from the blizzard's effects.<sp:0:4:0>You might want to be careful poking your
own beak in any caves.
Talk02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0500>Ordinarily, my wings would take me right
over a little pond like this.
Talk02_02:
<snd:TalkDeny_00>But I hurt my wing in a small scrap with
monsters. I don't see how I can fly over
the pond in this condition.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_01>I came to this cave to gather <clr:0000>chillshrooms<clr:ffff>
deep inside, but the cold water pooling in
there means that's not happening.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're going in there, too, careful you
don't slip.<sp:0:4:0>Fall in that <clr:0000>cold water<clr:ffff> and your muscles
might get too chilled to swim back out.
Talk02_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>The worst part is, I was just bragging to
the folks in the village that I'd bring back
even more <clr:0000>chillshrooms<clr:ffff> than last time.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a00>If I don't come back with at least <clr:0000>10<clr:ffff>
of them, there'll be egg on my face.
Near01: Now how do I get food?
Talk06:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Uh... <sp:5:0:0>You really don't mind giving me this
whole heap of mushrooms?<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>Seems like you must've gone to a lot of
trouble collecting this many.<sp:0:4:0>But if you're sure, then thanks a bunch!
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I can't just take them for free though.
Here, why don't I give you this?
Talk07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You looking for Tulin?<sp:0:4:0>He's out at another <clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> gathering food
with Gesane and them.<sp:0:4:0>There's a <clr:0000>bonfire<clr:ffff> marking the entrance.
You'll find it eventually if you <clr:0000>go west
down the mountain slope<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Understand_01>If you start freezing on your way there,
take a minute by the fire to warm up.
Talk04_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:TalkDeny_00>Ughhh. <sp:5:0:0>If I hadn't hurt my wing in a small
scrap with some monsters, I could have
crossed that pool in a few short flaps.
Talk04_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>How am I going to face the other villagers
without the <clr:0000>10<clr:ffff> chillshrooms I promised I'd
bring back?
Talk08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh>Feels like every cave I check has pools of
cold water building up now. <sp:5:0:0>Probably
another effect of the blizzard.<sp:0:4:0>You might want to be careful poking your
own beak in there, you know.
